Text:
This is a personalised install which automatically installs and registers bs player without any input from the user

it also requires UAC disabled or admin priviledges to run properly as the configuation file is stored in the installation folder not in a seperate folder in the appdata location it is usually stored in 

even though it scans clean and seems to run fine

I would suggest people wait for another release

In an update to the above

This in fact does not run fine , gives error on every file played

Very problematic and not worth downloading
